channel.title: INall
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INall, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Brain Cells Start To Die In Your 20s: How To Keep Your Mind Sharp As You Age
item.description: Neuroscientists and psychologists share their favorite games for keeping the mind young.

item.title: Verizon’s stock is having its best day in over a year. Here’s the big highlight from earnings.
item.description: The telecom giant upped its expectations for free cash flow, a closely followed investor metric.

item.title: Figma’s IPO seeks a $13 billion valuation, with a bitcoin investment as a sweetener

item.title: ‘Poof! His money could disappear’: My boyfriend is 75. His portfolio is down 4% this year. Do we fire his adviser?
item.description: “His portfolio is still down from the April slump when everybody else’s accounts have gone up.”

item.title: Just in: Southwest Airlines announces when it will start assigning seats
item.description: Southwest Airlines will switch to assigned seats on Jan. 27, 2026, the airline announced. Seat assignments will go on sale July 29, 2025.
